homePage.desc: I'm a Front-End Developer based in Kerman with over two years of professional experience in React.js and Next.js. Passionate about innovation, continuous learning, and creating engaging user interfaces.

about.title: About Me
about.SOne: Front-End developer with 2+ years of professional experience
about.STwo: Holds Bachelor's and Master's degrees in Physics, specializing in Nuclear and Complex Systems
about.STree: Started professional programming career after completing an intensive bootcamp
about.SFour: Proficient in JavaScript, React.js, and Next.js
about.SFive: Building responsive, user-friendly websites with a focus on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js
about.SSix: Passionate about innovation, continuous learning, and improving user experience through clean, efficient code and engaging design
